content: उपयोगः {@--1@} Employment, use, application, service; उपयोगं गम् or व्रज to be used or employed, serve; व्रजंति …अनंगलेखक्रिययोपयोगं <ls>Ku. 1. 7.</ls> {@--2@} Administration of medicine, or preparation of them. {@--3@} Fitness, suitableness, propriety. {@--4@} Contact, proximity. {@--5@} Any act contributing to the fulfilment of a desired object. {@--6@} Good conduct, observing established customs.
